body_html:
Hi @qlzh727 I see that a fix for this was added in 1498869 So this should be closed?

Could you put me in the loop on the process of bringing features and fixes from keras-team/keras to tensorflow.keras? Do you want contributions for this? I think that there are still issues in current rnn implementation here (as in it will not pass all the tests added here)
body_text:
Hi @qlzh727 I see that a fix for this was added in 1498869 So this should be closed?
Could you put me in the loop on the process of bringing features and fixes from keras-team/keras to tensorflow.keras? Do you want contributions for this? I think that there are still issues in current rnn implementation here (as in it will not pass all the tests added here)
body:
Hi @qlzh727 I see that a fix for this was added in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/149886979acf87027a188c0851f0cbe41a30f275 So this should be closed?

Could you put me in the loop on the process of bringing features and fixes from keras-team/keras to tensorflow.keras? Do you want contributions for this? I think that there are still issues in current `rnn` implementation here (as in it will not pass all the tests added [here](https://github.com/keras-team/keras/pull/11499))
